column4: how can i remove xmms2 and the other packages synaptic installed with it??
how can i remove all the packages synatpic installed with xmms2
it installed xmms2-core and some other stuff too though
did they show up for autoremoval?
but when i opened synaptic back up, xmms2-core was still installed
i reinstalled xmms2 to see what can be done
when i adjust the volume from my keyboard...i see the volume adjusting thing on the top right
but the volume doesn'ta ctually change
hmm, well there are multiple levels usually.. right click on the volume and watch all of the bars to see what changes with keyboard input
